original_title: کیوں تم سے اتنا پیار ہے
overview: The families of the two, a former judge and ex-chief minister are interlinked by nuptials, but do not serve as bonds. Talat is a power-hungry politician who stops at nothing ,bribery, killings, abductions,to achieve his goals. He is under investigation and the man in charge of the case is the same judge mentioned earlier, the traditional upstanding citizen and an upholder of values and justice
title: Kyun Tumse Itna Pyar Hai
